templates.template:
$stylevar[htmldoctype] $headinclude $vboptions[bbtitle] - $vbphrase[nntp_gate_menu_title] $header $navbar
$vbphrase[nntp_gate_menu_title]
$anouncemessage

$footer

<style type="text/css">
<!--
body { background: #FFFFFF; color: #000000; font: 10pt Tahoma,
Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; margin: 5px 10px 10px 10px; padding: 0px;
}
a:link { color: #22229C; }
a:visited { color: #22229C; }
a:hover, a:active { color: #FF4400; }
td, th, p, li { font: 10pt Tahoma, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; }
.alt2 { background: #E4E4E4; color: #000000; }
.smallfont { font: 11px Tahoma, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; }
.inlineimg { vertical-align: middle; }
.demo, .demo a { font-size: 11px; color: #808080; padding-top: 10px;}
-->
</style>

<% CSS %>
<% USER MENU %>

<% MESSAGE BODY %>

plugin.title: Add phrase group to correctly update groupaccess_cache
Admin: Add Template Group for NNTP Gate

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Global
phrasetype.phrase: Are you sure you want to delete this NNTP Group?

phrasetype.name: Scheduled Tasks
phrasetype.phrase: NNTP: Clean expired auth sessions from cache

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase: Can't remove group with mapped groups
This group can not be cleared
This group can not be removed
Group settings can not be changed

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: This text will be shown at the main forum page after clicking NNTP link.
Turn on debug log level for this users
For how many hours delay messages in demo mode
Maximum days number to store a message in list
Port to listen on for incoming connections.
Show statistics for last N days
